docs.snippet: From swashbuckling goals to inglorious exits, on-field shenanigans to sideline lunacy, the World Cup in Brazil has been one of the most remarkable of recent times.
docs.lead_paragraph: From swashbuckling goals to inglorious exits, on-field shenanigans to sideline lunacy, the World Cup in Brazil has been one of the most remarkable of recent times.

headline.main: Ten Memorable Moments at the World Cup
headline.print_headline: Ten Memorable Moments at the World Cup

docs.snippet: Brazil got 9.25 out of 10 from FIFA President Sepp Blatter for organizing a World Cup that was "very special" because of high quality football.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil got 9.25 out of 10 from FIFA President Sepp Blatter for organizing a World Cup that was "very special" because of high quality football.

headline.main: Blatter Awards Brazil 9.25 Mark for Special WCup
headline.print_headline: Blatter Awards Brazil 9.25 Mark for Special WCup

docs.snippet: The 2014 World Cup provided an unmatched level of football, outstanding individual moments, shocks, some controversy and it all took place in stadiums packed with knowledgeable and passionate fans.
docs.lead_paragraph: The 2014 World Cup provided an unmatched level of football, outstanding individual moments, shocks, some controversy and it all took place in stadiums packed with knowledgeable and passionate fans.

headline.main: Brazil 2014 Strong Contender as Best-Ever World Cup
headline.print_headline: Brazil 2014 Strong Contender as Best-Ever World Cup

docs.snippet: With Luis Suárez's transfer from Liverpool, the question now is: Where does the Uruguayan scoring sensation fit into Barcelona's team?

headline.print_headline: As Messi Changes, Suárez Could Fit Right In

docs.snippet: If the soccer team’s collapse teaches us anything, it’s to remember: You can’t win before the game is played.
docs.lead_paragraph: If the soccer team’s collapse teaches us anything, it’s to remember: You can’t win before the game is played.

docs.snippet: Serbia international winger Lazar Markovic has become Liverpool's fourth close-season signing after joining on a "long-term deal", the Premier league club said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Teachers in this South American country are going on a 24-hour strike to protest a wave of physical attacks on educators by students' mothers and fathers.

docs.snippet: The Pentagon has notified Congress of its intent to transfer six Guantanamo Bay detainees to Uruguay, two Obama administration officials said Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pentagon has notified Congress of its intent to transfer six Guantanamo Bay detainees to Uruguay, two Obama administration officials said Wednesday.

headline.main: Pentagon Plans to Transfer 6 From Gitmo to Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Plans to Transfer 6 From Gitmo to Uruguay

docs.snippet: The plan by Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel to move the men, who have been approved for transfer for more than four years, would break a bureaucratic paralysis over the deal.
docs.lead_paragraph: The plan by Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel to move the men, who have been approved for transfer for more than four years, would break a bureaucratic paralysis over the deal.
docs.abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel secretly notifies Congress that the military intends to transfer six low-level Guantanamo Bay detainees to Uruguay, possibly as soon as August 2014; group would be largest to depart the prison since 2009, and transfer would reduce Guantanamo Bay inmate population to 143.

headline.main: U.S. Is Said to Plan to Send 6 Detainees to Uruguay
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Said to Plan to Send 6 Detainees to Uruguay
